dc:title: On Pilgrimage: Russia, II
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Continues her account of a visit to Russia. Recounts a visit to Red Square, Lenin's tomb, the graves in the Kremlin wall, and comments on Russian writers. (The first part is in Document #513.)
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 515 1971-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
